TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A firm rod or inflatable device that is placed in the penis (an external male reproductive organ) during a surgical procedure. The implant makes it possible to have and keep an erection. Penile implants are used to treat erectile dysfunction or impotence.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "implante de pene"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Varilla firme o dispositivo inflable que se coloca en el pene durante un procedimiento quirúrgico. El implante permite tener y mantener una erección. Los implantes de pene se utilizan para tratar la disfunción eréctil o la impotencia.
